mc.name: Elephant Guide
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token into play.

mc.name: Quiet Speculation
mc.oracleText: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles his or her library.

mc.name: Balthor the Defiled
mc.oracleText:
Minion creatures get +1/+1.
{B}{B}{B}, Remove Balthor the Defiled from the game: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from his or her graveyard to play.

mc.name: Aven Fogbringer
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Aven Fogbringer comes into play, return target land to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Unquestioned Authority
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Unquestioned Authority comes into play, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.

mc.name: Spellgorger Barbarian
mc.oracleText:
When Spellgorger Barbarian comes into play, discard a card at random.
When Spellgorger Barbarian leaves play, draw a card.

mc.name: Wormfang Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Wormfang Drake comes into play, sacrifice it unless you remove a creature you control other than Wormfang Drake from the game.
When Wormfang Drake leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.

mc.name: Tunneler Wurm
mc.oracleText: Discard a card: Regenerate Tunneler Wurm.

mc.name: Laquatus's Disdain
mc.oracleText:
Counter target spell played from a graveyard.

Draw a card.

mc.name: Swirling Sandstorm
mc.oracleText: Threshold - Swirling Sandstorm deals 5 damage to each creature without flying if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

mc.name: Lava Dart
mc.oracleText:
Lava Dart deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

Flashback-Sacrifice a Mountain. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Flash of Insight
mc.oracleText:
Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

Flashback-{1}{U}, Remove X blue cards in your graveyard from the game. (You can't remove Flash of Insight to pay for its own flashback cost.)

mc.name: Breaking Point
mc.oracleText: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to him or her. If no one does, destroy all creatures and they can't be regenerated.

mc.name: Ember Shot
mc.oracleText:
Ember Shot deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

Draw a card.

mc.name: Exoskeletal Armor
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

mc.name: Guiltfeeder
mc.oracleText:
Fear
Whenever Guiltfeeder attacks and isn't blocked, defending player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.

mc.name: Test of Endurance
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.

mc.name: Sutured Ghoul
mc.oracleText:
Trample
As Sutured Ghoul comes into play, remove any number of creature cards in your graveyard from the game.
Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the removed cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness.

mc.name: Krosan Verge
mc.oracleText:
Krosan Verge comes into play tapped.

{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krosan Verge: Search your library for a Forest card and a Plains card and put them into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Stitch Together
mc.oracleText:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Threshold - Return that card from your graveyard to play instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

mc.name: Epic Struggle
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more creatures, you win the game.

mc.name: Anger
mc.oracleText:
Haste
As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

mc.name: Valor
mc.oracleText:
First strike
As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.

mc.name: Wonder
mc.oracleText:
Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.

mc.name: Brawn
mc.oracleText:
Trample
As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.

mc.name: Filth
mc.oracleText:
Swampwalk
As long as Filth is in your graveyard and you control a Swamp, creatures you control have swampwalk.

mc.name: Ray of Revelation
mc.oracleText:
Destroy target enchantment.

mc.name: Border Patrol
mc.oracleText: Vigilance

mc.name: Seedtime
mc.oracleText:
Play Seedtime only during your turn.

Take an extra turn after this one if an opponent played a blue spell this turn.

mc.name: Lightning Surge
mc.oracleText:
Lightning Surge deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead Lightning Surge deals 6 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.
Flashback {5}{R}{R} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Grizzly Fate
mc.oracleText:
Put two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens into play.
Threshold - Put four 2/2 green Bear creature tokens into play instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
Flashback {5}{G}{G} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Flaring Pain
mc.oracleText:
Damage can't be prevented this turn.

mc.name: Prismatic Strands
mc.oracleText:
Prevent all damage that sources of the color of your choice would deal this turn.

mc.name: Spurnmage Advocate
mc.oracleText: {T}: Return two target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target attacking creature.

mc.name: Forcemage Advocate
mc.oracleText: {T}: Return target card in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

mc.name: Nullmage Advocate
mc.oracleText: {T}: Return two target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mc.name: Riftstone Portal
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

As long as Riftstone Portal is in your graveyard, lands you control have "{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool."

mc.name: Golden Wish
mc.oracleText: You may choose an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Golden Wish from the game.

mc.name: Cunning Wish
mc.oracleText: You may choose an instant card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Cunning Wish from the game.

mc.name: Nantuko Monastery
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
Threshold - {G}{W}: Nantuko Monastery becomes a 4/4 green and white Insect Monk creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. Play this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

mc.name: Death Wish
mc.oracleText: You may choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Remove Death Wish from the game.

mc.name: Burning Wish
mc.oracleText: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Burning Wish from the game.

mc.name: Living Wish
mc.oracleText: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Living Wish from the game.

mc.oracleText:
Flying
Threshold - Battlewise Aven gets +1/+1 and has first strike as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

mc.name: Masked Gorgon

Green creatures and white creatures have protection from Gorgons.

mc.oracleText: When Ironshell Beetle comes into play, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

mc.name: Lead Astray

mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card.

Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

mc.name: Lost in Thought
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be played. Its controller may remove three cards in his or her graveyard from the game to ignore this ability until end of turn.

mc.name: Mist of Stagnation
mc.oracleText:
Permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses a permanent for each card in his or her graveyard, then untaps those permanents.

mc.name: Cephalid Inkshrouder

mc.name: Treacherous Vampire
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Treacherous Vampire attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you remove a card in your graveyard from the game.

mc.name: Cabal Therapy
mc.oracleText:
Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name.
Flashback-Sacrifice a creature. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Shaman's Trance
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, other players can't play cards from their graveyards, and you may play cards from other players' graveyards as though they were in your graveyard.

Counter target spell unless its controller removes his or her graveyard from the game.

Flying

mc.name: Genesis
